prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing Vibecarding greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

ðŸŽ¨ CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clichÃ© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "create a card version of the reference photo "
Style: âœ¨ Smart Style
Tone: ðŸ˜„ Funny - humorous and lighthearted
To: Jordan
From: Craig
Message: "Jordan, I had this custom card made to immortalize your finest moment. I hope it brings you as much joy as the original photo brings me every single time I look at it. Please display this masterpiece somewhere prominent.

Your biggest fan,
Craig"

Reference: "artistic transformation"

CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front â†’ interior â†’ back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the humorous and lighthearted tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way
- Include visual humor, playful elements, and whimsical details





- Create cartoon/illustrated characters inspired by reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions

Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "Vibecarding" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). I have included my own reference image. Create a stylized cartoon/illustrated character inspired by the reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions of real people, instead create charming cartoon-style characters with simplified, friendly features. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a warm, inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene from the photo will be translated into art with soft, translucent watercolor washes that bleed gently into one another, creating a dreamy and slightly nostalgic atmosphere. Fine, delicate ink linework will define the key elements and figures, adding a touch of handcrafted charm and clarity without feeling rigid. The color palette will be warm and sun-drenched, emphasizing golden yellows, soft oranges, and earthy tones to evoke a feeling of a cherished, happy memory. The overall effect is personal, heartfelt, and painterly, as if capturing a fleeting, beautiful moment just for Jordan.

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a Vibecarding card with humorous and lighthearted tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in a warm, inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene from the photo will be translated into art with soft, translucent watercolor washes that bleed gently into one another, creating a dreamy and slightly nostalgic atmosphere. Fine, delicate ink linework will define the key elements and figures, adding a touch of handcrafted charm and clarity without feeling rigid. The color palette will be warm and sun-drenched, emphasizing golden yellows, soft oranges, and earthy tones to evoke a feeling of a cherished, happy memory. The overall effect is personal, heartfelt, and painterly, as if capturing a fleeting, beautiful moment just for Jordan.

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Jordan, I had this custom card made to immortalize your finest moment. I hope it brings you as much joy as the original photo brings me every single time I look at it. Please display this masterpiece somewhere prominent.

Your biggest fan,
Craig" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clichÃ© designs and create something genuinely special! Style: in a warm, inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene from the photo will be translated into art with soft, translucent watercolor washes that bleed gently into one another, creating a dreamy and slightly nostalgic atmosphere. Fine, delicate ink linework will define the key elements and figures, adding a touch of handcrafted charm and clarity without feeling rigid. The color palette will be warm and sun-drenched, emphasizing golden yellows, soft oranges, and earthy tones to evoke a feeling of a cherished, happy memory. The overall effect is personal, heartfelt, and painterly, as if capturing a fleeting, beautiful moment just for Jordan.

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a warm, inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene from the photo will be translated into art with soft, translucent watercolor washes that bleed gently into one another, creating a dreamy and slightly nostalgic atmosphere. Fine, delicate ink linework will define the key elements and figures, adding a touch of handcrafted charm and clarity without feeling rigid. The color palette will be warm and sun-drenched, emphasizing golden yellows, soft oranges, and earthy tones to evoke a feeling of a cherished, happy memory. The overall effect is personal, heartfelt, and painterly, as if capturing a fleeting, beautiful moment just for Jordan.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover of a greeting card with a watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene features two adorable, simplified green dinosaur characters. The dinosaur on the left is holding up a small framed picture of a smiling person with brown hair. The dinosaur on the right is standing next to a grey printer, and a printed photo of the same smiling person is emerging from the printer tray. The background is a clean white with soft, warm yellow watercolor splatters and smaller dots, creating a cheerful and slightly whimsical atmosphere. The dinosaurs have large, friendly eyes, simple mouths, and subtle blush marks on their cheeks. The overall color palette is dominated by soft greens, warm yellows, and hints of orange for the characters' blush and mouths. The artwork is flat, 2D, and designed for full-bleed printing, with characters and key elements positioned to avoid the very top and bottom edges.",
  "backCover": "Back cover of a greeting card in a warm, inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. The design features subtle, delicate watercolor washes in soft yellows and oranges, reminiscent of the background of the front cover. Scattered across the background are small, scattered ink dots and gentle watercolor splatters, creating a sense of quiet artistry. The overall impression is serene and complementary to the front cover, providing a peaceful, artistic closure without any text or central figures. It maintains the established color palette and artistic techniques for visual continuity.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior page of a greeting card in a warm, inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. This page continues the narrative with a whimsical, abstract composition. The background consists of layered, soft, translucent watercolor washes in warm, sun-drenched colors like golden yellow, soft orange, and hints of earthy beige, with gentle bleeding between the colors. Overlaid on this are fine, delicate ink linework details that suggest organic shapes or subtle patterns, avoiding any representational imagery. The mood is dreamy and nostalgic, echoing the established color palette and artistic techniques, creating an artistic playground that feels personal and heartfelt without featuring any people or specific characters.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior page of a greeting card in a warm, inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. This page is designed to showcase the message text, \"Jordan, I had this custom card made to immortalize your finest moment. I hope it brings you as much joy as the original photo brings me every single time I look at it. Please display this masterpiece somewhere prominent. Your biggest fan, Craig.\" The text is artfully integrated into a decorative, innovative design. The background features soft, translucent watercolor washes in warm, sun-drenched tones of golden yellow, soft orange, and earthy hues, with subtle ink linework suggesting an abstract, painterly frame. The overall effect is personal, heartfelt, and unique, harmonizing with the left interior to create a cohesive spread, while prioritizing clear readability of the message without any people or characters."
}
```
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a greeting card with a warm, inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. The background features soft, translucent golden-yellow watercolor washes with subtle variations in tone and a few small, organic splotches of slightly deeper yellow and light orange, mimicking aged paper or a gentle watercolor bleed. A single, detailed watercolor and ink illustration of a large, soft-bristled paintbrush is centrally placed horizontally across the lower half of the cover. The brush has a brown, textured bristle head speckled with tiny flecks of gold or glitter, a metallic silver ferrule with subtle shading, and a smooth, light brown wooden handle. The overall aesthetic is peaceful, minimalist, and complements the artistic theme of the card, providing a quiet, complementary resolution to the visual narrative without any text or people. There is no visible space reserved for a QR code.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card with a vibrant, abstract watercolor and ink illustration. The background is a soft, warm wash of pale yellow, fading into cream towards the edges. A central explosion of warm colors â€“ bright oranges and golden yellows â€“ radiates outwards, characterized by energetic watercolor splashes and splatters. Intertwined with these colorful bursts are thin, delicate black ink lines that form complex, swirling, and looping patterns, resembling energetic scribbles or abstract floral motifs. These lines create a sense of movement and depth, contrasting with the softer watercolor. Scattered throughout the design are smaller, sharp splatters of vibrant blue watercolor, adding pops of cool contrast to the warm palette. The overall composition is dynamic and expressive, embodying a sense of joyful chaos and artistic energy, in a warm, inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. The scene is translated into art with soft, translucent watercolor washes that bleed gently into one another, creating a dreamy and slightly nostalgic atmosphere. Fine, delicate ink linework defines the key elements and figures, adding a touch of handcrafted charm and clarity without feeling rigid. The color palette is warm and sun-drenched, emphasizing golden yellows, soft oranges, and earthy tones to evoke a feeling of a cherished, happy memory. The overall effect is personal, heartfelt, and painterly, as if capturing a fleeting, beautiful moment. The image maintains a full-bleed background and is composed to avoid any critical elements being too close to the edges.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with a prominent, ornate golden frame encapsulating the text. The frame has a classic, slightly embossed appearance with rounded corners and a layered, dimensional effect, rendered in a warm, inviting watercolor and ink illustration style. Inside the frame, the background is a soft, creamy parchment color. The message text, "Jordan, I had this custom card made to immortalize your finest moment. I hope it brings you as much joy as the original photo brings me every single time I look at it. Please display this masterpiece somewhere prominent. Your biggest fan, Craig" is presented in a classic, easily readable serif font. The typography is dark, contrasting well with the lighter background. Subtle, artistic watercolor splatters in muted coral, teal, and ochre hues are strategically placed around the edges of the frame and on the outer parchment-like background, adding a touch of playful, unplanned artistry that suggests an inspired creative process. The overall aesthetic is refined yet whimsical, with a warm, sun-drenched color palette dominated by golden yellows, soft oranges, and earthy tones, creating a heartfelt and painterly feel. The composition is centered and balanced, ensuring ample visual appeal while clearly prioritizing the message.
